title: My reaction
body:
When adc's don't build banshees vs an Annie and they are the reason the team is losing. http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/698/489/2f7.png


Tip of the day for plat players and below: Build Banshees.

replies.body: I actually had a game recently on ARAM where I'm pretty sure my veil saved my life a few times. Doesn't even need reactions, though it does require dodging the skillshots they use just to pop it.

Or the ADCs that think they can just QSS her stun. 

"Hey mate it's cool you made that and all, but you realize the stun is just the icing right? Her RW damage is killing you."
Eh, vs an Annie, Banshees is better because it also blocks her burst as well as her CC.
